other_tests.findings: A tiny stone seen within segment 2 of the duodenum likely represents a recently passed gallstone. Peripancreatic fat stranding is compatible with pancreatitis. Overall picture is compatible with gallstone pancreatitis.
Initial creatinine level was 2.5, which increased to 2.7.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Creatinine levels increased from 2.5 to 2.7 during admission.

other_tests.findings: Lactate levels were 2.2 upon initial assessment and increased to 3.0.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Lactate levels increased from 2.2 to 3.0 during admission.

other_tests.findings: Initial WBC count was 13.9, which increased to 15.3.
other_tests.changes_over_time: WBC count increased from 13.9 to 15.3 during admission.
